modName: Requiem 1.8 - RND and Frostfall AiO Patch
summary: Single ESP that makes Frostfall and Realistic Needs And Diseases compatible with the latest version of Requiem.
descriptionHtml:
This patch makes the latest version of Realistic Needs and Diseases and Frostfall play nice together with Requiem 1.8.1.
This patch was originally made by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52739/?]Axonis[/url] but he decided that Hypothermia was a better choice than Frostfall for Requiem and no longer supports [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52739/?]Requiem - RND - Frostfall AiO Patch[/url].

While I enjoyed his new [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57643]Requiem - Realistic Needs & Hypothermia AiO Patch[/url] I really missed Frostfall so I've updated his patch that was originally made for Requiem 1.7.3.

[url=http://web.archive.org/web/20140814201631/http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228/]Realistic Needs and Diseases[/url] and [url=http://web.archive.org/web/20140814201631/http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/]Frostfall[/url] are two great lore-friendly mods, that add a lot of immersion to the game, they give a real purpose to food, drinks and clothes. This patch integrates both mods with [url=http://web.archive.org/web/20140814201631/http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/]Requiem[/url] within a single esp plugin.

Requirements :

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]
[url=http://web.archive.org/web/20140814201631/http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281/]Requiem[/url]
[url=http://web.archive.org/web/20140814201631/http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/]Frostfall[/url]
[url=http://web.archive.org/web/20140814201631/http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228/]Realistic Needs and Diseases[/url]

Load order :

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
Unofficial Skyrim Patch.esp
Dawnguard.esm
Unofficial Dawnguard Patch.esp
....
[other mods]
....
Requiem.esp          <------------------ Should be quite low in your load order.
....
Chesko_Frostfall.esp
RealisticNeedsandDiseases.esp
Requiem - RND - Frostfall AiO Patch.esp


This patch also increase the torch radius to make them actually useful with dark nights added by ENBs or other mods such as [url=http://web.archive.org/web/20140814201631/http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49472/]Realistic Nights[/url], which is highly recommended.


All the credits goes to Axonis.


---- Changelog ----

1.28

- It now include fixed RND scripts which were conflicting with the script that makes your character use the warming hand animation.


---- Installation / Updating ----

1.2x -> 1.28

- Since the 1.28 change scripts, before updating I recommend you to stop RND, wait a moment to make sure RND has been shut down, save.
- Uninstall previous version and install the 1.28 patch
- Load your last save, enable RND again and play.
author: axonis
